comment.author: 25695066@N00
comment._content:
Located near the River Somme, the Arras Cathedral would suffer bombardment throughout much of the First World War.

Here is a higher perspective photo of the the interior of the cathedral from an earlier point in the war.  It is posted, along with other photos of the cathedral, at the National Library of Scotland's photostream on Flickr.
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/nlscotland/4699809769/]
